name: Bathroom Blitz
description: Bathroom Blitz places you in the shoes of a transgender woman in America and tasks you with what should be a simple objective: use the restroom. You will of course have to avoid being seen by anyone who might try to kick you out or get aggressive and make sure to keep a handle on your dysphoria to keep yourself from having a breakdown in the middle of a public restroom, but that's just a part of the everyday bathroom experience isn't it?
